summary: A laboratory  is a work place where scientific research, experiments, or measurement are done.
full_text: The University of Cologne  is the sixth oldest university in Central Europe and, with more than 48,000 students, one of the largest universities in Germany. It is furthermore the German founding member of the Global Alliance in Management Education . Since 2012 the university was awarded in the German Universities Excellence Initiative for its overall concept. As of 2015, the University of Cologne ranks 156th globally according to Times Higher Education, 305th according to QS World University Rankings and between 151st-200th according to the Academic Ranking of World Universities.
title: University of Cologne
